snippet.title: Cloud Gardens Trailer
snippet.description:
Cloud Gardens is a game about plants overgrowing a post-industrial wasteland, and taking the time to chill.

Wishlist on Steam 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1372320/Cloud_Gardens/

Follow the development of Cloud Gardens on Twitter
https://twitter.com/noio_games
